text:
Hi everyone, I'm having an issue with a video background.
This <https://www.trimetisls.com/-temporary-slug-aca078d2-c6c5-4fb4-b562-7508882223fc?hs_preview=nVerhaKY-155477067082|link> is to the view of how the page looks from desktop.
The mobile is not loading as it should (see video). I'm using a video module for both desktop and mobile. I have four sections total, two visible for desktop and the other two visible for mobile. I duplicated and edited one of the video background modules to try to adjust the height allowance to fix my problem, but this hasn't fixed anything. Any suggestions? See the screenshots:
